HTML Tutorial Part 2

This continues the tutorial on HTML. It discusses how to create lists of items, how to link Web pages together and how to put applets in your pages.

Chapter Topics:

  • Lists.
  • Applets in Web pages.
  • Hyperlinks.

QUESTION 1:

Isn't it irritating to type lists with a typewriter?
